data.name: Why the Future Is More Offline Than You Think
data.summary:
Attend this session and learn:

How to distribute a consistent brand positioning, identity, and messaging across digital and brick-and-mortar channels
How to build a marketing strategy and team that leverage the strengths of both DTC and wholesale channels
How to take advantage of the halo, visibility, and social following of your retailers to boost your own

Brady Donnelly
Founder & Managing Partner
